name: Solitare match
description:
Reminder, follow 8080 for notifications on updates ! Let's keep Amiga alive and prosper! Most important is to have fun!

Your payment/tip is a contribution for my Amiga projects ;)

Solitare match Demo version has 5 levels. Paid version has 10 levels and more to come!

Game is in development and I'm aiming at 100 levels! It will take some month's to build & test levels and probably some game code fixes as well! 

I'll try having 1 update/month, +10 levels ect.

NEXT VERSION IN PROGRESS:

Minimum CPU 50MIPS+ (many code optimisations), + 10 levels

REQUIREMENTS

AmigaOS3.x

AHI

RTG 960x540 16-bit window/fullscreen

CPU 100MIPS+

RAM 60MB+ Free
